local_intent: Grasp the white plate using the precomputed side grasp and confirm the object is held.
assumptions: Grasp pose has been computed and stored at key white_plate_grasp
coherence_with_global: Follows the global grasp phase: detect white_plate, ensure grasp key exists, align with tolerance 0.005, execute Pick with timeout 1200, then verify via IsGraspStable and ObjectInGripper.
